desc: Revolutionary Stem Cell Therapy by PURTIER Placenta 6th Edition with Worldwide Distribution rights. Live Cell Therapy using Deer Placenta stimulates the renewal process of aging. Product from RIWAY International - Singapore Prestige Brand award winner. 幹細胞療法 ｜ PURTIER 鹿胎盤素 第六代 ｜活細胞療法 ｜ 力匯國際

layout.text: PURTIER Placenta live-cell therapy is a rolls royce supplement for the past 12 years. Today we have launched the 6th edition which contains 12 ingredients - Deer Placenta Live Stem-cell, White Strawberry Extract, Apply Polyphenol, Fucoidan, Dendrobium, Squalene, Lycopene, Avocado Oil, Marine Collagen Peptide, Borage Oil, Aloe Vera and Evening Primrose Oil. Together, the 5 technologies and 12 ingredients has the perfect formulation to rejuvenate our aged body cells. With the addition of 4 new ingredients, White Strawberry Extract, Apple Polyphenol, Fucoidan and Marine Collagen Peptide, Purtier Placenta Live Cell Therapy is committed to bringing people greater health conditions with renewed hope - a method that is convenient and effective in achieving healthy body and youthful looks.
